description: A release is a digital construction of a pinball game.
title: Release

___description.description: A short description of the release. Will be Markdown formatted.

___created_at.description: Timestamp when the release was added to the database.

____created_by.description: Reference to the user who created this release. Only visible by contributors and above.

___links.description: A list of links related to this release.

___label.description: A short label describing the link

____tags.description: None, one or multiple reference to tags.

___authors.description: One or more authors of this release.

___roles.description: One or more roles of the user.

____compatibility.description: Reference to one or more compatible builds.

____media.description: References to media related to the file.
____media.title: Media References

___flavor.description: Defines the flavor of the file.
___flavor.title: Flavor

___orientation.description:
Table orientation. Values:

* `ws` - Widescreen, for playing on desktop PCs.
* `fs` - Fullscreen or portrait, used on cabinets.

___lightning.description:
Playfield illumination. Values:

* `day` - Illuminated playfield.
* `night` - Dark playfield.

___changes.description: Changelog. A list of changes for this version.

___original_version.description:
In case of a mod, this refers to the original version of the release (i.e. the "modded release").

It can either be a direct link within VPDB, or a label and URL to an external resource.
___original_version.title: Original Release

____ref.description: Reference to the original version within VPDB.

___release.description: In case the modded release is not on VPDB, this links to an external resource.
___release.title: External Release Resource

___url.description: URL when the modded release can be found.

___id.description: Unique identifier for a release. Gets generated automatically on creation.

___acknowledgements.description: Free text describing people who helped creating this release but are not considered as authors.
